name: Explore Hue Countryside by Bicycle
description: Besides the well-known tourist attractions like royal citadel, imperial tombs, pagodas... Hue owns a peaceful countryside resting a lots of traditional handicraft villages. Escape the hustle of Hue for the surrounding countryside, and gain a unique insight into local life during this relaxed biking tour. Discover the friendly locals and the real face of Vietnam while cycling through some of the country’s prettiest landscapes.
